评论详情: I have this dress in 3 different colors so I love it !
The dress is as expected. Same color as advertised and the fabric is comfortable. The only downfall is that it is rather sheer. I’m nervous to wear it out in the summer on a sunny day.

The design of this dress is gorgeous and has a boho vibe. Unfortunately, it’s not suited for women with a larger bust, as the fit is very unflattering. The material quality also feels cheap and not worth the price. It looks much better in pictures than in person, which was disappointing. While it might work for smaller-chested women, it doesn’t offer the needed support. I wanted to love it, but it just didn’t meet my expectations.
Nice dress , it looks just like the picture but it fits weird and the material is just not what it says it is. It would be OK but it’s not worth the price for sure.
I love this dress so much although don’t put it in the dryer because it shrinks
I love this dress so much I bought 2. I get so many compliments on the blue dress. Complete strangers will walk by and tell me they love the dress.
Did not look right.

Purchased for a bookish themed photoshoot. Added a silk cardigan to make it a little more modest. It can be slightly see through if the light hits you just right, so plan accordingly. Also recommend wearing some nip covers. The length was perfect. It can be little tricky to get on over the girls, but managed just fine. I’m 5’8, around 135lbs, 36DD.

I love this dress, I actually bought the same dress but in teal last year. It looks so good that I wanted another color and I’m very happy about this last color I picked! It looks amazing! Very good deal

This is not as well made as the rvimmios brand one. There's one more brand on here (that sadly doesn't have black), and people said the front was double lined so I was hoping for that. Nope, this one is even more sheer. The skirt is less full feeling and the fabric doesn't feel as nice. It fits a little better in the waist maybe, but my biggest issue is the front area is even smaller than the large I ordered in the other brand (and this one I got XL). Sewing seems a bit shoddy and there's no tag (just the size XL).  You can't tell in the photos but when I take a deep breath you can see my sides of my stomach and ribs which was not the case in the other one because it was wider in front with a fuller skirt. This is super unflattering and I don't feel cute in it like I did in the other. Definitely cover your nips in either one and wear solid panties. I can't imagine this in a light color lol. Also, I'm usually a small or medium but a 36d. Obviously if you have a larger bust or ribcage, this is one is not wide enough in the front.
Pretty but see through

After looking for a size of this dress that would fit me for months I finally found this one. Day one, it's a little small for my tastes but nothing that actually affected the dress and it looked good. I accidentally spilled on it so through it in a gentle wash. It shrunk, at least four inches from the hem. Now that's too short. No washing instructions to tell me it might happen if I didn't wash it correctly so I was on my own. Extremely disappointed. Now I'm just gonna have to make my own.
The fabric is really good quality, the fit is true to size and the back is super sexy!
Great dress, nice quality materials, TTS. Looks exactly like the Free People Dress. I got it in black and my sister in khaki and they are both great.

Love how stretchy the fabric is. I used this dress for my maternity shoot and the pictures came out great. The flow of the dress was perfect. Also it’s not a maternity dress so make sure you size up when you buy one I bought it as a large and usually in a small medium regular size.

Super cute dress. Very similar to my FAVORITE clothing line Free People. Can be dressed up or worn casual. Perfect in length. It does fit a bit small in the chest. Measurements for reference. 5’7” 115lbs 34D

It’s not the most flattering. I’m 5’2 and it’s just weird looking in the torso area. I would think this would be better for y’all girlies. Other than that the material felt nice and flowey. Although, I will be returning, it’s not for me.
Ordered up a size and would need 2 if not 3 sizes up to fit properly
a little long for 5ft person but looks and feels amazing

Love the free people brand look alike without the high price point! Fabric is a bit sheer. Glad the straps run tighter for support! Usually a medium /large got an xl for friend . She wouldn’t be able to fit as would be small for DDs . I tried on. Keeping for myself. Definitely would size up if a bit curvy.
if you have a smaller chest this may work for you, but it didn’t for me although i wish it did it was cute
I was so surprised to find a dress like this quality is very good fit True to size am 160 pounds I use medium or large depending but this dress I took it medium fits beautifully.
Runs small, material feels cheap

The dress is feminine and sexy I will be purchasing in other colors. I purchased an Xl…. 36DD (heavy), 5‘8“ 220  hips and butt God did his thing when he was putting me together, and this dress helps me show off his work. You can do pasties or nothing I haven’t decided yet depending on the event I might go braless the dress can support either way.
As title states. This dress is cute, but thin. I think in a lighter shade I would have had to wear a slip under it. I did size up, but wish I would have even went up one more size.
Not great for ladies who are well endowed. I had to size up because of my breasts but it was still uncomfy.  Very pretty but also had defects (back strap was broken and sewn on backward).

This is a beautiful dress, but sadly did not work for me.  The chest part is hard to get in and out of for me (40DD) and very tight as it has very little elasticity.  The material is soft and light, but not thick.  I bought XL.  Might try a bigger size.
Had a year in it but super cute style wish I could have kept it. Also I got it for a maternity dress and the biggest size still wasn’t enough
I cannot wait to wear this dress for family pics on the beach. It’s beautiful, I love the color, and it’s long enough. Highly recommend!

Ordered an XXL and was so excited to get the dress but was immediately disappointed when I took it out the package. The bottom part of the dress was an XXL but the top was definetly tooo small to be an XXL. I even had my daughter try it on and she’s a medium and the top barely covered her breasts.

For reference, I’m 5’4” 98lbs and purchased the small. The fit, support, color material, everything was absolutely perfect. The top was tight enough to give amazing support and the flowy material was so comfortable. The dress is long on me and with wedges it was right at ground level. Absolutely worth the purchase!!!

评论概述: Is very thin and less material then the original brand.
评论详情: It wasn’t a bad dress at all but still very pretty. ALTHOUGH it wasn’t the same dress as the original dress brand that it states it is. Color is PRETTY but not 100 percent what I was expecting since having one from the actual brand. Sizing is a bit SMALLER and the amount of material is about 20 percent less than it should be.
Love this dress, i wore a sticky bra.  It took me awhile to figure out how to get it on(stepping in).  The neck strap broke right away but it looks even cuter without it!

评论概述: Not even close to the Free People version…
评论详情: Check out the picture to see the difference in the amount of fabric used for this cheaper version compared to the real free people dress. The fit is much smaller too.

评论概述: Beautiful, but a little too long
评论详情: Love how this dress fits and looks. Just be sure that if you want to wear a bra to get something backless — I had to pull padding out from a sports bra in a pinch, but it worked. Also as someone who is 5’3” this dress is a tad bit too long, but not enough to deter me from wearing it. I’m sure if I wore heels it wouldn’t be a problem.
Fits tight at the top, I'm 5'6 150 with regular almost small sized breasts and it was quite tight at the top but fit nicely everywhere else and material is decent.

评论概述: I may be the largest an XL would fit!

Somtimes its hard to gage whether or not somthing in XL will fit so i posted pictures of myself for reference! Hope this review helps!

You will have to doctor this one up. It’s very sheer and I don’t feel the cut is very flattering. Will be returning. It also runs small. I’m tall and skinny (5’7” and 125lb.), ordered a small and it was a little tight but fit. It has a drawstring in the back and is not elastic. It’s also a little long but not too long where you’re stepping on it. If it weren’t so sheer I would consider keeping it, but don’t want to figure out a way to make it work. Our clothes should work for us and not the other way around.
It’s very tight for bigger chested women but very stretchy and flowy.
So cute on and fits different body types. Holds up nice in the was too.

I don't add a picture because this is EXTREMILY see-through. Some babydolls have more coverage. If you're looking for something to wear at night in the privacy of your home, go for it. Very comfortable.
I can't wait for summer!  This dress is a dream.  Sexy, great price point, and comfortable.  I bought 2 and just may order more.
The texture is amazing so light I like it so much really amazing , the style is just perfect

This summer dress is do light and comfortable but I'd be careful wearing it out in public with the sun fully out! It's pretty sheer and see through when in the sun so I'd suggest at least wearing another skirt or a slip under it just to be on the safe side!

So the quality is okay. I wanted to love the dress but it’s not for me. I’m a little wider up top and the straps on the back are stretchy but not stretchy enough to look good. I bought the black and it was still a little sheer definitely not meant for girlies who are wide up top
I loved this dress so much.
I bought this for a Moana-themed party.  It worked perfectly.  I’ll be wearing it when I am not Te Fiti as well.  Great quality.  Perfect for the summer.  For true to size.
Love this dress!
Just like the picture! Love how it fit
Love Love Love this.  It's comfortable, flowy and the back makes it so sexy.

Loved the green one! Super flowy, light.

If you have bigger breast i would suggest a large or extra large. I ordered a medium and it showed some side boob and was super tight around the waist. I got a large and it fit perfectly around the waist and my breast.

The straps across the back are not adjustable, which is the only reason I am not comfortable in the dress. I don’t mind showing my back. But it creates bigger back rolls when pressing in. They tried to make me pay for return shipping, when asked why they told me to keep the dress instead. Great customer service if you contact them about their mistake.
Very soft material, fits close to size. Love, love, love this dress.

评论概述: so see thru but cute to look at
评论详情: As the title has it, this dress is cute. In fact I have a similar dress in blue but that one is lined and thicker. This dress is too sheer to wear to an event with my daughter. Super cute dress! It was perfect for my senior photos!
this dress is so pretty! it is a little bit long on me, but i am 5ft. regardless it’s so perfect
I could have sized up from a small. Material a bit see through in this color. I would recommend hand washing only to prevent shrinking.
Size up if you are too heavy. Hides the bottoms perfectly though.

I haven't had a chance to wear the dress anywhere yet but I absolutely love it.

I love these dresses, they are so much fun for the beach at night or a campfire. Only thing you have to be careful with is the size. The skirt tends to be a little long. So if you’re like me, and are around 5ft tall, you might wanna get and XS. It’s stretchy, so it’s not uncomfortable.
Fantastic fit ans  so comfortable
Was very surprise by this item. Great quality, love the dress. Free people dupe of Extratropical maxi dress.
I love this dress it fits perfect. I ordered an xl I'm 5'2 190lbs

Super comfortable, soft, and as you can see I used the top back strap as a halter style and tied the other one at the back of my neck after crossing the straps on my chest. I'm very hippy at 5'3", 166 pounds with 34C bra size . This is size large in sky blue. Wearing flats the bottom barely drags the floor, super cute in heels or boots as well. Looks like a urban outfitters dress for 1/3 or maybe even a 1/4 of the cost

This dress is almost perfect, but not quite. It definitely is very long and short people will have to wear heels or get it hemmed. this dress is absolutely stunning - the color is beautiful the fabric is soft - my inky complaint is the waist is a little big but there’s drawstrings for that
This dress is so flattering. Quality material. Stayed secure all night dancing. It feels great and is so cute!
so comfortable and flattering

Love this dress! Fits so well. I feel like a goddess in it
This dress is so see through. I got it in the ivory. You can see literally everything. It’s not something I would wear in public.

I'm 5'4, 188lbs. My bust is in the "D" range. Im wearing a size medium. I NEVER go without a bra but THIS dress held my chest upright comfortably. It's a bit tight to put on if you get your exact size as the strings on the back do not come apart. Wiggle your way in or size up if you're thicker.
I loved this dress when I originally bought it, but unfortunately after one wash it has shrinked and it’s now super short and no longer floor length. Disappointing.

I’m 230lbs, 5’7, apple shaped with most of my weight in my tummy, I also have a wide rib cage. This dress made me feel and look amazing. I’m a C-D and it has enough support for me.
Loved this dress

I've been looking for a beach dress for a cruise.  This dress is perfect.  Light enough material that has a flow to it but yet not see through.  I am 5'5" and 150lbs.  I wear a size 6-8 pant size and the size medium fits perfectly. The length of the dress meets the floor barefoot but with a small wedge heel, the dress is the perfect length. Love love love!!!! Wore this to a festival and it was great!

This is such a gorgeous piece and color is amazing. Like most things I seem to buy, it is really long.... I wish they would make these a bit shorter. I am 5'5''. I love this dress because the fabric is nice and it has a nice and comfortable stretch.
